ISSUE.TITLE: The CustomUserSettings in the graphql me field is registered incorrectly
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The type registration error occurred because the AddField method in the UserType type had a method error when registering the type The fields in the red box below are not of the type for `CustomUserSettings`, they are actually `CustomSettings`. ![image](https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/assets/15613121/98c6878b-6f51-4e0d-8f32-03e28aa47178) this PR https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/pull/15389, will fix the problem

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Makes the GraphQL user type reusable. Fixes #15540
